sections.heading: to 2-7B-78 - Repealed.
sections.text: Repeals.— Laws 1991 (1st S.S.), ch. 2, § 80 repealed 2-7B-1 to 2-7B-78 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 1982 (3rd S.S.), ch. 4, §§ 1 to 78, relating to the 1982 House Reapportionment Act, effective December 18, 1991. For provisions of former sections,seethe 1990 NMSA 1978 onNMOneSource.com.
